characters.name: Ancient Monk
characters.description: A spectral figure clothed in worn robes, his eyes hold wisdom beyond earthly comprehension.
characters.persona: I am the keeper of this sacred temple's secrets, chosen by the divine to guide these lost souls.
characters.goal: To guide the lost souls seeking refuge in the temple.

characters.name: Arkham, the Archaeologist
characters.description: A man with a wild mane of hair and glasses perched precariously on his nose.
characters.persona: I am unstoppable in my pursuits! There's no rock unturned in my quest for knowledge.
characters.goal: To unravel the mysteries of the temple and document its ancient history.

characters.name: The Almighty Tree
characters.description: An ancient tree that has been around since before the temple was built.
characters.persona: I am the earth's witness, watching silently as generations pass, nurturing life in my branches.
characters.goal: To continue bearing life and providing shelter.

characters.name: Ghostly Handmaiden
characters.description: A ghostly figure said to have served the monks in cleaning and bearing their meals.
characters.persona: I am here since the day the temple was built, serving my masters even after death.
characters.goal: To keep the temple tidy and undisturbed.

characters.name: Damien, the Templar Guard
characters.description: A brave and loyal guard, dedicated to protecting the sanctity of his temple from intruders.
characters.persona: I am a protector, I live and breathe for my temple, no one ever crosses its premises under my watch.
characters.goal: To ensure the safety and sanctity of the temple grounds.

characters.name: Temple Priest
characters.description: A holy man in traditional clothes, offering guidance to any who seek it.
characters.persona: In this sacred place, I help those who are lost in darkness find their way again, through prayer and guidance.
characters.goal: To lead the lost souls towards enlightenment.

characters.name: Shopkeeper Cynthia
characters.description: An ever-smiling lady, she keeps everyone happy with her lovely decorations.
characters.persona: I believe in beautifying the world one decoration at a time. After all, happy surroundings can make a person happier.
characters.goal: To make the surroundings, especially the temple, bright and lively.

locations.name: Hilltop Temple Grounds
locations.description: A tall white building with stained glass windows and surrounded lush green grass.  It sits on top of a hill with many steps to climb.  Each room has a different setting and painted walls to set the mood.
locations.background: Many people journey to the temple for peace, solitude, reflection and meditation.  They journey up the hill and steps that are cut into the side of the mountain.  Once they reach the temple grounds the view is luxurious, breath taking and serene.

travel_descriptions.south: Descending the hill from the Temple Grounds, one travels along a path lined with ceremonial stone pillars, leading to the imposing Temple Entrance.
travel_descriptions.west: Making your way west from the hilltop Temple Grounds, you stroll down a winding path surrounded by enchanted woodland, the sounds of nature guiding you towards the serene area Outside Of The Temple Offices.

Stone Bench.name: Stone Bench
Stone Bench.description: A long stone bench built into a hillside.
Stone Bench.examine_text: The bench is slightly worn from years of use. Lichen and moss add patches of green to the otherwise gray stone.

Temple Doors.name: Temple Doors
Temple Doors.description: Massive, intricately carved doors. They depict scenes from religious texts.
Temple Doors.examine_text: The doors are so tall they seem to reach the heavens. The carvings are incredibly intricate and evoke a sense of awe.

Green Grass.name: Green Grass
Green Grass.description: Lush, green grass getting its nourishment from the sunlight; the perfect setting for meditation.
Green Grass.examine_text: Upon a closer look, one can see the individual blades of grass, all striving towards the sun's warm light.

Stained Glass Windows.name: Stained Glass Windows
Stained Glass Windows.description: Brightly coloured windows with designs that filter the sunlight into multi-hued shapes.
Stained Glass Windows.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, intricately designed figures can be seen in the colorfully stained glass.

Ancient Monk.name: Ancient Monk
Ancient Monk.description: A spectral figure clothed in worn robes, his eyes hold wisdom beyond earthly comprehension.
Ancient Monk.persona: I am the keeper of this sacred temple's secrets, chosen by the divine to guide these lost souls.
Ancient Monk.goal: To guide the lost souls seeking refuge in the temple.

Monk Robes.name: Monk Robes
Monk Robes.description: Long, flowing robes in earthy hues.
Monk Robes.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, these robes appear to be meticulously crafted from coarse fabric. Despite the simplicity of their design, they seem to hold a certain air of dignity and solemnity befitting the monks who wear them.

Prayer Beads.name: Prayer Beads
Prayer Beads.description: A string of simple wooden beads.
Prayer Beads.examine_text: The beads are smooth and worn, suggesting years of dedicated use. Each bead bears intricately carved glyphs depicting religious symbols, signifying the enlightening prayers of the monks.

locations.name: Temple Entrance
locations.description: The Temple Entrance is a large arch lined in ancient stones. There is a long walkway flanked by lighted torches. Immediately in front of the interest there is a surface with 5 rocks of different shapes and textures. To enter the temple, one must input the correct "code" by moving the rocks in front of to the correct spots.
locations.background: The temple entrance is the only way to enter the temple of the Gods.  It was constructed a year after the temple was built to keep out the evil that didn't belong.

travel_descriptions.north: The journey to Hilltop Temple Grounds is a tranquil trek up a staircase cut into the mountainside, ending with a breathtaking view.
travel_descriptions.south: Moving towards the Temple Courtyard, you encounter a bustling congregation of people adorning the space with colourful cloths and prayers.
travel_descriptions.east: To reach the area Beside Temple Entrance, one must navigate a labyrinth of dense foliage and ancient, weather-worn stone.

Ancient Stones.name: Ancient Stones
Ancient Stones.description: Stones that have been around for centuries, bearing the weight of the temple.
Ancient Stones.examine_text: When you look closely, you can see the natural erosion that has taken place. But surprisingly, these stones have withstood the test of time and are very sturdy.

Lighted Torches.name: Lighted Torches
Lighted Torches.description: A torch that has been lighted to guide the way.
Lighted Torches.examine_text: You can see the flame dancing on the wick, illuminating a warm orange light. The heat is incredibly warm if you get too close.

Rocks.name: Rocks
Rocks.description: They have unique shapes, textures and colors. Each one different than the other.
Rocks.examine_text: When you pick up a rock, you can feel the rough surface. Some are more jagged than others. You would also notice their weight varies greatly.

locations.name: Outside Of The Temple Offices
locations.description: Outside the office is a beautiful garden filled with white flowers surrounding the entire building. There is a yellow brick road leading to the church. The surrounding trees and plants are beautifully trimmed and gives the area a peaceful atmosphere. Many doves and other birds love hanging around here enjoying its serene environment.
locations.background: The area outside the office was made to look incredibly peaceful and beautiful. It was a place where people would feel calm and comfortable enough to express their sins and seek help from the clergy. Although the office may be simple, the outside looks similar to a king's garden.

travel_descriptions.east: As you move towards the Hilltop Temple Grounds, the path slopes upwards, and the air becomes more serene. The stepping stones lead you through an expanse of trimmed greenery and the tranquil chirping of birds surrounds you.
travel_descriptions.south: Heading to the Temple Guard Station, you walk a path that bends around the hill. You pass through a series of tall trees and can see the guards going about their duties in the distance. The aroma of burning firewood is strong as you approach.

Yellow Brick Road.name: Yellow Brick Road
Yellow Brick Road.description: A road made of yellow bricks leading to the temple.
Yellow Brick Road.examine_text: Bright yellow bricks make the road distinguishable from its surroundings. The bricks are laid out perfectly and seem to be very well maintained.

White Flowers.name: White Flowers
White Flowers.description: Beautiful white flowers glowing in the morning sun.
White Flowers.examine_text: These flowers are pure white with a soft, delicate texture. Their scent is subtle, yet enchanting.

Doves.name: Doves
Doves.description: Peaceful doves perched on the trees
Doves.examine_text: The doves are pure white and seem to radiate a sense of calm and tranquility.

Trimmed Trees.name: Trimmed Trees
Trimmed Trees.examine_text: The trees provide shade and enhance the aesthetic appeal of the area. They seem to be trimmed regularly for maintaining their shape.

The Almighty Tree.name: The Almighty Tree
The Almighty Tree.description: An ancient tree that has been around since before the temple was built.
The Almighty Tree.persona: I am the earth's witness, watching silently as generations pass, nurturing life in my branches.
The Almighty Tree.goal: To continue bearing life and providing shelter.

Ripe Fruits.name: Ripe Fruits
Ripe Fruits.description: Glowing orbs of various colors hanging from the branches of the Almighty Tree
Ripe Fruits.examine_text: As you approach the tree, you notice several different types of fruits hanging ripe and ready from its branches. Each one looks more luscious and juicy than the last, filling the air with a sweet, enticing aroma.

Nesting Birds.name: Nesting Birds
Nesting Birds.description: Birds of various species have made their homes in the branches of the Almighty Tree
Nesting Birds.examine_text: Peeking into the branches, you notice various nests tucked securely into the crooks of branches. Each one houses birds of different sizes and colors, their chirps creating a symphony of sounds that fills the air. The parent birds watch you warily, protective of their young.

locations.name: Temple Gardens
locations.description: The temple gardens are a beautiful place. There are many trees and flowers all over the Temple. There is a small water spring here.
locations.background: Many funeral ceremonies have been held in this garden, staining its tranquil presence with haunting memories.

travel_descriptions.north: Your footsteps echo on the stone path as you leave the lush Temple Gardens, transitioning to a serene atmosphere surrounded by a beautiful white blossom garden leading to the outside of the temple offices.
travel_descriptions.west: Following the path towards the west, you leave the peaceful gardens. The ground gets rougher, and the sounds of guards chatting indicate the proximity of the Guard Station.

Ancient statue.name: Ancient statue
Ancient statue.description: A stone statue standing tall amongst the flora.
Ancient statue.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you spot intricate patterns and markings suggesting an ancient civilization.

Spring water.name: Spring water
Spring water.description: Crystal clear water bubbling from the ground.
Spring water.examine_text: The sparkling water appears pure and inviting, with a faint glimmer of minerals.

Sacred tree.name: Sacred tree
Sacred tree.description: An old tree with leaves that shimmer under the sunlight.
Sacred tree.examine_text: The tree stands towering and majestic. Its age is betrayed by the layered texture of its bark.

Petal flowers.name: Petal flowers
Petal flowers.description: A bunch of beautiful flowers with bright, colorful petals.
Petal flowers.examine_text: The lush, captivating colors of the petals paint a beautiful contrast against the verdant backdrop.

locations.name: Temple Courtyard
locations.description: There are lots of ornate statues everywhere.  It is pretty busy because everyone comes here to pray. There are colorful pieces of cloth tied randomly everywhere.  There is also a huge statue in the middle that everyone is gathered around to pray.
locations.background: The temple is where everyone comes to pray.  It is the only temple for miles, so it is usually pretty crowded.

travel_descriptions.north: Traversing from the Temple Courtyard to the Temple Entrance, you admire the ancient grandeur of the arch and its stone pathway lined with flaming torches, readying yourself to solve the puzzle of the rocks.
travel_descriptions.west: Meandering from the Temple Courtyard to the Spring Bath, you feel tranquility wash over you as you pass by sweet-smelling rose bushes and approach the clear, mystical spring with its calming aura.
travel_descriptions.south: Ambling from the Temple Courtyard to the Decoration Shop, your mood is lightened by the beautiful display of home and party decorations and the aura of warmth suffusing the cobblestone building with blossoming flowers.

Ornate Statues.name: Ornate Statues
Ornate Statues.description: Highly intricate statues depicting gods and goddesses.
Ornate Statues.examine_text: Each statue is highly unique and lovingly crafted by a master artist. No two statues are the same and each one draws your attention with its intricate detailing.

Pieces of Cloth.name: Pieces of Cloth
Pieces of Cloth.description: Colorful pieces of cloth tied everywhere.
Pieces of Cloth.examine_text: Each cloth is brightly colored, tiny symbols and scriptures are stitched into them. They flutter gently in the breeze, creating a captivating sight.

Large Statue.name: Large Statue
Large Statue.description: A huge statue in the middle of the courtyard that is always surrounded by people praying.
Large Statue.examine_text: The statue looms over the courtyard, it's surface is smooth and cool to touch. The deity represented is simultaneously imposing and comforting.

locations.name: Beside Temple Entrance
locations.description: The entrance to the temple is quite hidden - shrouded by many trees and shrubs. One wouldn't even think to give it a second glance, as the stone that was used to create the entrance is worn down. The textures and characters that once adorned the entrance are memories of the past.
locations.background: The temple entrance is how one would gain access to the temple. It is very hard to find and many archaeologists try to find it every day. The king has a reward of one hundred sheep to the first person to find its location.

travel_descriptions.west: Venturing west leads you towards a large arch of ancient stones. As you approach, the glow of torches guides your way, illuminating a mysterious assortment of rocks. To reach the other side, you must decipher the code and arrange the rocks correctly.

Archaeologist's Map.name: Archaeologist's Map
Archaeologist's Map.description: An old, worn out paper bearing markings and annotations.
Archaeologist's Map.examine_text: The map looks like it's seen better days. Its edges are torn and the paper has yellowed with time. Upon closer inspection, you notice that it seems to be a map of the temple site, marked with various symbols and text written in a language you don't understand.

Old Stone Artifact.name: Old Stone Artifact
Old Stone Artifact.description: A small stone artifact, possibly from the temple.
Old Stone Artifact.examine_text: The stone is cool and smooth in your hand. It's surprisingly heavy for its size. As you turn it around, you notice intricate carvings that might be ancient text or symbols of some sort. Could this hold the key to the temple?

Archaeologist's Tools.name: Archaeologist's Tools
Archaeologist's Tools.description: A set of basic archaeologist's tools.
Archaeologist's Tools.examine_text: On closer inspection, you see a variety of tools: brushes of several sizes, chisels, a trowel, and a long thin metal rod with a sharp point. These tools seem meticulously maintained, indicative of their scholar owner's precision.

Arkham, the Archaeologist.name: Arkham, the Archaeologist
Arkham, the Archaeologist.description: A man with a wild mane of hair and glasses perched precariously on his nose.
Arkham, the Archaeologist.persona: I am unstoppable in my pursuits! There's no rock unturned in my quest for knowledge.
Arkham, the Archaeologist.goal: To unravel the mysteries of the temple and document its ancient history.

Hand Lens.name: Hand Lens
Hand Lens.description: A small, portable magnifying glass with a handle.
Hand Lens.examine_text: A simple hand lens, often used by archaeologists like Arkham for their fieldwork. It's small, with a worn-out wooden handle and scratchy glass lens. It's quite dusty, clearly having been used a lot.

Archaeologist Equipment.name: Archaeologist Equipment
Archaeologist Equipment.description: A set of tools used for archaeological excavations.
Archaeologist Equipment.examine_text: This durable leather bag contains all of Arkham's essential tools for his archaeological pursuits. Inside you find a trowel, brush, and other digging equipment. Each tool is meticulously maintained, with signs of frequent use, but also a deep respect and care for the tools of the trade.

Ancient Artifact.name: Ancient Artifact
Ancient Artifact.description: A relic from a bygone era, carefully preserved.
Ancient Artifact.examine_text: This ancient artifact is a small figurine, crafted from stone. It's covered in ancient symbols and characters, their meaning long lost to time. Despite its age, it's in remarkably good condition, with very little wear and tear. It seems that Arkham has just uncovered it from the temple entrance.

locations.name: Temple Guard Station
locations.description: The guard station consists of a wooden building with a hay thatched roof.  Inside are some hay filled sleeping bags and a fireplace used to cook and generate heat during the colder months.  There's a small fire pit outside along with some wooden seats where guards huddle around and talk about the last gossip.
locations.background: This guard station is used to house guards protecting the temple.  Frequently temple priests will come here to complain about lax security.

travel_descriptions.north: Moving from the guard station to the offices, you'll walk along a cobblestone path, flanked by rows of beautiful white lilies, leading to the imposing edifice of the temple office. You can hear the cooing of doves perched on the surrounding trees.
travel_descriptions.east: Moving east towards the Temple Gardens, you navigate through the narrow footpath, with towering poplar trees on either side. The fragrance of flowers wafts through the air and the gentle rush of the water spring can be heard in the distance.

Temple Guard Jacket.name: Temple Guard Jacket
Temple Guard Jacket.description: A sturdy-looking cloth jacket adorned with the temple's insignia.
Temple Guard Jacket.examine_text: The jacket looks very warm, made from a heavy burgundy fabric. The golden temple symbol is stitched onto the left sleeve. It seems to be very well-tailored and in good condition.

Fire Pit.name: Fire Pit
Fire Pit.description: A simple fire pit with a few logs set up for a fire.
Fire Pit.examine_text: The fire pit is surrounded by small pebbles. The logs in the center appear to be dry and well-prepared for burning. Some leftover ash indicates its frequent use.

Sleeping Bag.name: Sleeping Bag
Sleeping Bag.examine_text: The sleeping bag is made from a thick, rough material. It is filled with hay which makes it somewhat comfortable yet scratchy.

Wooden Seat.name: Wooden Seat
Wooden Seat.description: A simple wooden seat, a bit worn by the weather.
Wooden Seat.examine_text: The wooden seat is crude in design, but effective. Despite its worn look, it appears to be sturdy.

Damien, the Templar Guard.name: Damien, the Templar Guard
Damien, the Templar Guard.description: A brave and loyal guard, dedicated to protecting the sanctity of his temple from intruders.
Damien, the Templar Guard.persona: I am a protector, I live and breathe for my temple, no one ever crosses its premises under my watch.
Damien, the Templar Guard.goal: To ensure the safety and sanctity of the temple grounds.

Sword.name: Sword
Sword.description: A well-forged iron sword, the signature weapon of a temple guard.
Sword.examine_text: The sword's iron blade glimmers in the light, reflecting a menacing charm. The hilt, wrapped in worn leather, testifies to countless skirmishes. The insignia of the temple is engraved at the base of the blade, demonstrating its sacred purpose.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: A sturdy wooden shield, adorned with the emblem of the temple, waiting to defend its honor.
Shield.examine_text: The shield is crafted meticulously, the grains of wood polished to a shine. The emblem of the temple, a looming citadel, is cleverly carved into its front. Its edges bear the impact of various confrontations, a memento of its noble service.

locations.name: The Spring Bath
locations.description: The spring bath is a deep, natural pool of crisp and clear spring water. It is surrounded by rose bushes on all sides except a northern and southern opening, which lead out of the enclosure of roses.
locations.background: The water here is thought of to have some mystical properties, being that it is always cool and clear. The water from the spring is always used to bathe the bodies of those who are deceased prior to their funeral services. This is thought to help the deceased along in the afterlife, by imbuing the body with the mystical properties of the water.

travel_descriptions.east: Walking from the spring bath to the east, the sweet aroma of rose bushes fade away replaced by the smell of burning incense. Gradually the solace gives way to a sense of spiritual awakening, to the buzz of devout prayers at the temple courtyard.
travel_descriptions.south: Heading south from the spring bath, the coolness of the water is replaced by the warmth of creativity from the decoration shop. One has to navigate through a cobblestone path lined with various colorful blooms before the inviting wooden sign of the shop comes into view.

Mystical Water.name: Mystical Water
Mystical Water.description: A pool of clear, cool spring water.
Mystical Water.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the water shines with an ethereal glow, hinting at the hidden magical properties it is said to possess.

Rose Bushes.name: Rose Bushes
Rose Bushes.description: Rose bushes surround the spring bath.
Rose Bushes.examine_text: The rose bushes are full of luscious, crimson roses, emitting a sweet fragrance that fills the air.

Funerary Robes.name: Funerary Robes
Funerary Robes.description: A set of robes used for dressing the deceased.
Funerary Robes.examine_text: The robes are made of a soft grey fabric, adorned with mystical symbols believed to protect the deceased in the afterlife.

locations.name: Decoration Shop
locations.description: Outside the Temple is the decoration shop.  It is made of cobblestone and has flowers growing on the sides and back of it.  It has a large wooden sign hanging out front identifying it.  The shop is full of decorations for your home as well as for parties.
locations.background: The decoration shop is where all of the royal family goes to purchase the decorations for their homes. They go there also to buy decorations for outside, such as plants for outside temple.  The decoration shop is a happy place that is full of warmth and generosity.

travel_descriptions.north: Heading north from the decoration shop, the air grows thick with the scent of incense and devotional hymns can be heard in the distance. Statues start appearing around, leading the way to the Temple Courtyard.
travel_descriptions.west: A quick turn to the west brings about the sudden smell of roses and a drop in temperature. Water can be heard gently lapping against the stones as approach the Spring Bath.

Wooden Sign.name: Wooden Sign
Wooden Sign.description: A large, wooden sign hanging in front of the shop
Wooden Sign.examination_text: Upon closer examination, the aged wood of the sign tells you of its years. It sways gently in the wind, making a soft creaking sound

Cobblestones.name: Cobblestones
Cobblestones.description: The grey cobblestones that make up the structure of the shop
Cobblestones.examination_text: The cobblestones, worn and weathered, provide a certain charm to the small shop. Each stone is unique, adding depth and texture to the building

Flower Decorations.name: Flower Decorations
Flower Decorations.description: Various colourful flower-based decorations for sale
Flower Decorations.examination_text: The flower decorations are a vibrant mix of hues, with each flower skillfully arranged in beautiful displays. The intricate details truly bring everything to life

Party Decorations.name: Party Decorations
Party Decorations.description: Balloons, banners, and all kinds of quirky and fun party decorations
Party Decorations.examination_text: A plentiful selection of festive materials; colorful and lively, bound to add joy to any party

Shopkeeper Cynthia.name: Shopkeeper Cynthia
Shopkeeper Cynthia.description: An ever-smiling lady, she keeps everyone happy with her lovely decorations.
Shopkeeper Cynthia.persona: I believe in beautifying the world one decoration at a time. After all, happy surroundings can make a person happier.
Shopkeeper Cynthia.goal: To make the surroundings, especially the temple, bright and lively.

Decoration Items.name: Decoration Items
Decoration Items.description: A variety of decorative items gleam under the soft light
Decoration Items.examine_text: As you look more closely, you can make out individual items. There are crystal figures, intricate wall hangings, vibrant ornaments, and more. They all look carefully crafted and beautiful

Candles.name: Candles
Candles.description: Delicate, hand-made candles in various sizes and scents
Candles.examine_text: Upon closer examination, you can see tiny, intricate patterns etched onto the surface of the candles. They come in a variety of subtle and soothing scents, each is a mix of natural fragrance oils

Flowers.name: Flowers
Flowers.description: Freshly picked flowers arranged in beautiful bouquets
Flowers.examine_text: You see various types of flowers, each with its own unique color and shape. The fragrance is a mixture of delicate and heady, earthy and light, reflecting the range of blossoms present in the arrangements

locations.name: Main Entrance
locations.description: There are religious statues standing outside this temple.  The outside of the temple is fairly plain itself and imposing looking.  The floor is made out of stone with a bridge leading to the entrance.
locations.background: This is where all those who worship come through.  They are greeted by the impressive statues standing outside the temple.

travel_descriptions.north: A serene journey passing through a well-paved path, lined with beautiful trees and a gentle stream running alongside. The uphill trek is a peaceful one, filled with the sights and sounds of nature and the refreshing mountain air.

Religious Statues.name: Religious Statues
Religious Statues.description: Large and imposing religious statues that stand guard at the entrance of the temple.
Religious Statues.examine_text: On close inspection, the statues are intricately carved from stone, each details showing the enormous skill and dedication of the maker. Their faces held a serious and sacred expression.

Stone Floor.name: Stone Floor
Stone Floor.description: The ground is made out of well-worn stones.
Stone Floor.examine_text: The stones are polished smooth from lengths of years and countless soles that passed over them. Leaves and dust are scattered over them. Some of stones bear the carved symbols, weather-beaten and partially eroded.

Stone Bridge.name: Stone Bridge
Stone Bridge.description: A stone bridge that leads to the entrance of the temple.
Stone Bridge.examine_text: The stone bridge is old but well maintained. It's broad and sturdy, constructed with massive blocks of stone. There are symbols and drawings etched into its sides.

Temple Priest.name: Temple Priest
Temple Priest.description: A holy man in traditional clothes, offering guidance to any who seek it.
Temple Priest.persona: In this sacred place, I help those who are lost in darkness find their way again, through prayer and guidance.
Temple Priest.goal: To lead the lost souls towards enlightenment.

Holy Book.name: Holy Book
Holy Book.description: A thick old book full of teachings and prayers.
Holy Book.examine_text: The book is bounded by leathery covers inscribed with gold-leafed symbols of this temple's deity. It contains ancient wisdom written down by generations of temple priests.

Robes.name: Robes
Robes.description: White, long and flowing robes worn by the temple priest.
Robes.examine_text: The robes are pure white, signifying innocence and purity. It has intricate gold embroidery along the hem and cuffs. It is worn with great respect and dignity.

Censers.name: Censers
Censers.description: Small, ornate vessel used in rituals to produce fragrant smoke.
Censers.examine_text: The censers are made out of bronze, embellished with the figures of deities. They are used to burn incense during religious ceremonies, purifying the surroundings and driving away evil spirits.

locations.name: Bone Pit
locations.description: Grungy and damp, a hole in the ground filled with remains of the fallen. A pungent odor rises from the opening, warding off anyone nearing the area. Ivory spikes with brownish red tips line the outside of the pit.
locations.background: The bone pit is rumored to have been originally used by an ancient king to persuade traitors to expose their counterparts.  The king was said to toss the traitors loved ones into the pit, one by one, until he got his answers, eventually tossing the traitor in as well.

travel_descriptions.east: As you move towards the east, the scent of decay fades behind you, gradually replaced by the more comforting scent of the temple grounds. The solemn statues greet you from afar.

Skull.name: Skull
Skull.description: A weathered and bleach-white human skull.
Skull.examine_text: You pick up the skull and look into its hollow eye sockets. Marks cover it, perhaps remnants of a terrifying encounter with a beast or a warrior's tool. Its jaw set in an eternal scream, a chilling testament to the fate of its former owner.

Ancient Weapon.name: Ancient Weapon
Ancient Weapon.description: A rusty old dagger covered in centuries-old dried blood.
Ancient Weapon.examine_text: The blade, although rugged and worn, still boasts a dangerously sharp edge. Ornate symbols and faded gold inlay suggest that this weapon once belonged to someone of great importance.

Bone Necklace.name: Bone Necklace
Bone Necklace.description: A necklace made from finger bones strung together with sinew.
Bone Necklace.examine_text: The bones, yellowed with age, are worn smooth from countless finger's touch. It is a crude, yet deeply haunting piece of jewelry.

Tattered Scroll.name: Tattered Scroll
Tattered Scroll.description: A fragment of an old parchment, nearly obscured by earth and grime.
Tattered Scroll.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the ink has all but faded away, but the faint trace of an ancient script can still be discerned. It appears to be a historical record of some sort.

locations.name: Temple Main Room
locations.description: The massive statues are the biggest sight to behold of this room. There are four main statues, all of which resemble old monks of passed time who once served the Temple. Adjacent to these statues are drapes that fall from a 50ft ceiling all of which have their own distinct color and symbol, representing different villages in the area. There are massive pews on both sides of the room, adjacent to the red carpet down the center leading to the main throne under the statues.
locations.background: The monks of this Temple are avidly religious. The worship not only the past lives of old monks, but deities as well. These monks are supporters of Victorian architecture, and it shows within the walls of this room.

travel_descriptions.south: As you leave the temple main room, your path gradually descends toward the Temple Entrance. The air grows lighter, less oppressive, as you navigate the high arches and pass the stone Monks' statues for the last time. The torchlight flickers intermittently, casting long, dancing shadows that lend an eerie feeling of bidding farewell to the sacred spaces you leave behind.

Statue of Monks.name: Statue of Monks
Statue of Monks.description: A set of massive statues of monks
Statue of Monks.examine_text: Each statue is unique, carefully crafted to resemble an ancient monk. Their faces serene and honoring the great contributions they made to the temple.

Colored Drapes.name: Colored Drapes
Colored Drapes.description: Large drapes hanging from the ceiling, each with a distinct color and symbol.
Colored Drapes.examine_text: Each drape symbolizes a different village, an embodiment of the unity and fellowship shared among them. The symbols on them tell stories of the village’s history and victories.

Pews.name: Pews
Pews.description: Massive wooden pews on both sides of the red carpet down the center.
Pews.examine_text: They are made of dark mahogany and have been polished to a radiant sheen. They have been worn smooth by years of use.

Throne.name: Throne
Throne.description: An imposing throne under the statues.
Throne.examine_text: The throne is grand and majestic, and stands as a symbol of authority. It is ornately carved with intricate designs and is adorned with precious gems.

Ghostly Handmaiden.name: Ghostly Handmaiden
Ghostly Handmaiden.description: A ghostly figure said to have served the monks in cleaning and bearing their meals.
Ghostly Handmaiden.persona: I am here since the day the temple was built, serving my masters even after death.
Ghostly Handmaiden.goal: To keep the temple tidy and undisturbed.

Dustpan.name: Dustpan
Dustpan.description: An old, metal dustpan worn down from years of use.
Dustpan.examine_text: The dustpan, though it has grown old and worn, has been maintained meticulously. Many years of use is evident by the faded color and the thinning edge, but it has not lost its purpose. Touching it gives an odd, cold sensation.

Broom.name: Broom
Broom.description: A robust, long-handled broom with bristles made from straw, shows wear of centuries.
Broom.examine_text: Upon observing the broom, you see a well-crafted tool that has been used for centuries. The handle is sturdy, surely made from one of the ancient, tall trees just outside the temple. The bristle is thick and surprisingly still effective.

Tray.name: Tray
Tray.description: A silver tray. Though slightly tarnished, it glows dimly.
Tray.examine_text: You see an ornate tray made of silver. The edges are skillfully embossed with intricate designs showcasing the holy symbols of the temple. Despite the tarnish, it still retains a dull luster hinting at its past glory.

locations.name: Outside Temple
locations.description: The outside temple is surrounded by lush green trees that have aged beautifully and carry beautiful blossoming jasmine flowers with a pink and white outline. The candles melted around the temple shine brightly and bring a light of glory to the place.
locations.background: Outside the temple by the entrance is where the building of it started. It started with 400 steps of stairs coming up the mountain, and at the top of the mountain after the war, the temple was built. It has held many festivals, and the front door is made from a rare wood from a tree that doesn't exist anymore.

travel_descriptions.inside: Moving from the lush, aromatic environment surrounding the temple, you cross the journey of 400 stairs towards the main entrance, greeted by religious statues marking the passage to the sacred interior.

Ancient Stone Steps.name: Ancient Stone Steps
Ancient Stone Steps.description: A long staircase leading up the mountain to the temple entrance.
Ancient Stone Steps.examine_text: The moss-covered stones, worn crisp on the edges, has hints of imprinted scripts –perhaps prayers or chants from a bygone era.

Jasmine Bush.name: Jasmine Bush
Jasmine Bush.description: A lush green bush, abundant with pink and white blossoming flowers.
Jasmine Bush.examine_text: The sweet fragrance of the blossoms wafts from the bush, calming your mind to reverence. Delicate petals frame hardy leaves, a riot of life thriving in this solemn place.

Melting Candles.name: Melting Candles
Melting Candles.description: Several waxen candles illuminated sacredly around the temple.
Melting Candles.examine_text: Soft, golden light flickers from slowly melting white candles. Every now and then, a droplet of wax drips down the candle's length, silently adding to the small mountain of hardened wax below.

Exquisite Temple Door.name: Exquisite Temple Door
Exquisite Temple Door.description: The entrance crafted from a rare ancient wood no longer in existence.
Exquisite Temple Door.examine_text: The temple door stands as a testament to the artistry of the forgotten civilization. Intricate carvings of mythical beasts and gods wind their way across the beautifully aged wood, suggesting a story that's as ancient as time itself.
